sèrvi: in átriîs domûs Dei nostri. ^ you that stand in the house of the Lord
Dòminum: in the courts of the house of our God.

sèrvi: qŭia bonus Dòminus~; psállite nómini ejus
Dòminum: qŭóniam suáve. ^ Praise ye the Lord
^ Praise ye the name of the Lord~; O yo: for the Lord is good~; sing ye to his name

sèrvi: Israhélem in possessiónem sìbi. ^ For the Lord hath chosen Jacob unto himself

1 ^ Laŭdáte nomen Dòmini~; laŭdáte: 5 ^ Qŭia ego cognóvi qŭod magnus est Dòminus
sèrvi: et Deus noster praĕ òmnibus deîs. ^ For I have known that the Lord is great
Dòminum: and our God is above all gods.

praise the Lord: et in òmnibus abìssîs. ^ Whatsoever the Lord pleased he hath done

sèrvi: fùlgura in plúviam fecit~; qŭi prodúcit vèntos de tesáŭrîs suîs. ^ He bringeth up clouds from the end of the earth~; he hath made lightnings into rain. He bringeth forth winds out of his stores.

1 ^ Laŭdáte nomen Dòmini~; laŭdáte: 8 ^ Qŭi percùssit primogènita Aegìpti ab hòmine usqŭe ad pècus. ^ He slew the firstborn of Egypt from man even unto beast.

^ Praise ye the name of the Lord~; O yo: et in òmnes sèrvos ejus. ^ He sent forth signs and wonders in the midst of thee

sèrvi: et occáĕsit reges fortes~; ^ He smote many nations

Dòminum: et òmnia regna Canaánis. ^ Sehon king of the Amorites
praise the Lord: and all the kingdoms of Canaan.

sèrvi: hereditátem Israhéli pòpulo suo. ^ And gave their land for an inheritance
Dòminum: for an inheritance to his people Israel.
memoriále tuum in generatiónem et generatiónem. ^ Thy name

sèrvi: et in sèrvîs suîs deprecábitur. ^ For the Lord will judge his people
Dòminum: and will be entreated in favour of his servants.

sèrvi: ópera mánuum hòminum. ^ The idols of the Gentiles are silver and gold

Dòminum: et non vǐdébunt. ^ They have a mouth
^ Praise ye the name of the Lord~; O yo: but they speak not~; they have eyes

sèrvi: et non áŭdient~; nèqŭe ènim est spíritus in ore ipsórum. ^ They have ears
Dòminum: but they hear not~; neither is there any breath in their mouths.

1 ^ Laŭdáte nomen Dòmini~; laŭdáte: 18 ^ Sìmiles illîs fiant qŭi fáciunt ea
sèrvi: et òmnes qŭi confídunt in eîs. ^ Let them that make them be like to them
Dòminum: and every one that trusteth in them.

^ Praise ye the name of the Lord~; O yo: O house of Israel~; bless the Lord
O house of Levi~; you that fear the Lord

sèrvi: qŭi hábitat in Jerusalíme. ^ Blessed be the Lord out of Sion
